title: Salmon Croquettes
directions: Combine salmon, seasonings, veggies, egg, and breadcrumbs in a bowl.
Mix well with hands until nicely combine.
Heat enough olive oil for frying patties in a large skillet.
Form a patty with salmon mixture and coat evenly with flour on both sides.
Place carefully in the skillet, so as not burn yourself, and cook thoroughly on both sides [roughly 2 minutes per a side]
Remove to a plate covered with a paper towel to soak up extra oil.
ingredients: 1 can wild pink salmon [without bones if possible]
